channel.title: DCA DIARY TEST
channel.description: Recent content on DCA DIARY TEST

item.title: The DCA Diaries
item.description: I wanted to do a first hand dollar cost average test by buying Bitcoin each day, so I’ll be buying a set amount each day. for the purposes of the experiment and privacy I’ll normailise the purchase to £10.00 per day and £100 per day, as well as provide the USD equivalent. I will be factoring fees into my entry price, so it will be the all in price. How: Each day I’ll buy at the time I think I’ll get the best price at.
